pkgmetadata.longdescription: OpenTelemetry Psycopg Instrumentation=====================================|pypi|.. |pypi| image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/opentelemetry-instrumentation-psycopg2.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/opentelemetry-instrumentation-psycopg2/Installation------------:: pip install opentelemetry-instrumentation-psycopg2References----------* `OpenTelemetry Psycopg Instrumentation <https://opentelemetry-python-contrib.readthedocs.io/en/latest/instrumentation/psycopg2/psycopg2.html>`_* `OpenTelemetry Project <https://opentelemetry.io/>`_* `OpenTelemetry Python Examples <https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-python/tree/main/docs/examples>`_
